group_1.textCenter: I'm glad the girls here don't mind being@interviewed.
Although it makes it almost too easy for me.
(I shouldn't let her see my face, even if we@are both Feathers.)
Wh-what is it?! Has something happened?

group_1.textRight: Ta-da! It's your most favoritest maid, Ikumi!
Did I scaaare ya?
Ryo?
Mhuh?! Why aren't you piping up?
A-are you super mad? It was just a@silly-willy joke...
Um... I'm really, extra-specially sorry. Did@I overdo it?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100151:motion_100][chara:304601:cheek_0][chara:304601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:304601:lipSynch_1]*Snort* Ah ha ha!

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: I was getting you back for scaring me like @that.
Ta-da! Did I scare you?

group_1.textRight: Geeze... You really had me going there...@Also, you copied my lines...

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, sorry. Did you need something?

group_1.textRight: Nope, I just have some time to kill before@my shift at the maid cafe starts.
I thought we could hang out, if you're free.
Were you working on the newsletter?

group_1.textLeft: I'm almost done.
I've already interviewed a bunch of Feathers.
Wait...

group_1.textRight: Hmmmmmm?

group_1.textLeft: I just realized, I've never interviewed you.
If you're free, let's fix that.

group_1.textRight: Sure, sure!
Oh! Wait a teeny, tiny sec...
My photo's gotta be from thiiis angle.
I'm extra cute on this side!

group_1.textLeft: Well...the Wings of the Magius Newsletter@usually doesn't show anyone's face.

group_1.textRight: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?! [wait:0.8][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]Oh phooey, I forgot!

group_1.textLeft: That's what the robes are for, after all.

group_1.textRight: Awww... I know that, silly goose... *Sniffle*
What kinds of stuff are you writing, then?

group_1.textLeft: Our feature story is about how we had our @wishes granted and then became Feathers.
Since it's for this organization, we don't@publish any names.
And the article can't disclose any@identifying information.

group_1.textRight: I seeeee, okay... Errmmhmm...

group_1.textLeft: What's up?

group_1.textRight: We two have a connection of sorts, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Well, yeahâ€¦

group_1.textRight: So, this is a super-duper opportunity!
I want to tell you about whyyy I became a@Magical Girl.
What do ya think?

group_1.textLeft: It might go in the newsletter article.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... [chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305301:cheek_0][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]That's okey-dokey with me. It's not@especially secret info or anything.
But I do really want to tell you about it,@Ryo!

group_1.textLeft: If you want to tell me that badly, I suppose@I'll listen.

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
I'd looove to hear YOUR story, if you feel@like sharing it with little ol' me!
Of course, you don't gotta tell me if you@don't want to.

group_1.textLeft: My story? You mean when I made my wish?

group_1.textRight: Yup! [chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305301:cheek_0][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]I super don't mind if you're not@feeling like it.

group_1.textLeft: Sure, I'll tell you. It's not very@interesting or anything...
But I want to keep things fair between us.
